title: Can we have a bronze border next season?
body: Every elo gets a border, I think that there should be a way to differentiate the people who actually play ranked vs the people who don't play ranked. Think about it this way, at least us bronze players are brave enough to play ranked knowing that we're not the best out there. Meanwhile the unranked people are too scared to play ranked.
